examples: The singer has issued a sweeping denial of all the rumors.
The denial of "There might be X" is the null, "False, there is no X."

definitions.definition: A refusal or failure to provide or grant something that is requested or desired .
examples: The denial of medical treatment to those who cannot afford to pay is scandalous.
I cannot understand the bank's denial of my loan application.
Every time we asked for an interview we got a denial .

definitions.definition: Refusal to believe that a problem exists.
examples: We couldn't break through his denial about being alcoholic.

definitions.definition: Refusal to admit responsibility for wrongdoing.
Negationism , denialism of historical facts or accepted interpretation.
A defense mechanism involving a refusal to accept the truth of a phenomenon or prospect .
examples: He is in denial that he has a drinking problem.
The denial of Jesus by Peter.
